comments: Tanja is one of the best professors I have EVER had. She makes it really easy to learn, helps students and cares about their success. She\'s funny, flexible, and easy to work with. I can\'t say enough good things about her, but this is an amazing class and I don\'t think I would have been nearly as successful in Statistics without her as my teacher.

comments: Tanja was hands down one of THE best Professors I\'ve had the privilege of having at UNR. Her homework and exams are pretty evenly weighted. so if you\'re a terrible test taker like me you can still pull a B as long as you do the work. She\'s super understanding & is willing to work with you if you\'re having troubles! 10/10 would recommend.

comments: Tanja made the summer mini-session as stress free as possible! I would take one of her classes again in a heartbeat. She makes the lectures and material as understandable as possible and takes the time to answer any questions/confusion that comes up. I struggled in ECON261 but felt extremely confident after taking ECON262 with Tanja.

comments: Prof Hayes is amazing. great teacher. HUGE on group work, which is nice for the tests. Be prepared to have to write a group paper, however. Overall, this is a relatively easy class and you will definitely walk away knowing more about economics. Make sure to get the bookebook because you have to write chapter summaries.

comments: A great teacher; made the material very accessible. Gave too low of a point value to some of the group tests, meaning a small mistake costing a point reduced the grade a lot. Moved too fast for me on those too, but that\'s due to the class. Light grader on writing, but strict on tests. Be meticulous. Is big on group work and participation too.

comments: Professor Hayes is an excellent instructor. Sometimes she talks about nonsense but the general consensus is that students are able to learn a lot from her class. Homework consists of mandatory reading guides and a few take home examsfinal. Don\'t let the take home component fool you though, they are really difficult.
